name: BostonGlobe
text: Polls are now closed in the Massachusetts primaries. Follow along with our live results, which auto-refresh every 15 seconds: https://t.co/em5505bw80 https://t.co/yCGYwTEIWE

name: BostonGlobe
text: From @Adrian_Walker: In a race that often seemed mired in who was or was not “progressive” it might have been easy to forget just how similar these men are politically. https://t.co/WSvFp1wMEw

name: BostonGlobe
text: The #Celtics beat the #Raptors, 102-99, to take a 2-0 lead in their best-of-seven Eastern Conference semifinals series. https://t.co/hYEw5FGzzS

name: BostonGlobe
text: Amid racial justice protests and the disparate effect of the pandemic on people of color, some legislative races feature people of color and women running for seats long held by white lawmakers. https://t.co/FZEKZU0fKz
